phrases: In the second half of the 20th century, Japan was suffering the greatest economic recession since the War.
What with the repeated chain reactions of bankrupcies...
Meanwhile, the masked honor student Miyazawa Yukino...
was the ultimate Queen of Vanity.
Arima Souichirou, the one who changed her...
Although how they came about was different, the two came to share a secret as...
And they decided to live for their own true happiness.
But the storms of life subjected them to an...
Do not lose heart, Arima Souichirou.
What Are You doing standing there daydreaming?
I am at a sensitive age!
My family has five members, including me.
My mother, and father, and two sisters.
That makes five people and one dog.
Yuki calls him our big little brother,
She only talks about simple things, but she is warm and kind.
Even from our perspective, they seem to be a happy couple.
My immediate older sister is Tsukino.
I have NO clue what she is thinking.
She says zany things all the time, so I
What have you been mumbling about?
As a whole, my family keeps up a good facade.
Put us together and we are snow, moon, and flower,
the nice things to look at in the seasons.
I do think we sisters are all rather good looking.
Yuki is especially pretty, just like our mother.
She is smart, and gets things done.
That is the eldest daughter, Yukino.
but I have read lots of books and seen lots of plays.
I think I observe people rather objectively too.
I look carefree, but I really have it together.
the family will be safe as long as I stay strong.
Maybe that is a little too pompous.
Gee sis, you are home early!
Dad said he got tickets from someone at work.
If we win, he said we could go somewhere for New Years!
Sheesh, why does our family always count the chickens before they are hatched?
Well, you could say that we are just typical middle class,
and that would be the end of it but...
It is old, but it is quite touching.
Touching is good, but try to cry about it only when you are awake.
Your face is going to bloat.
Do not just stick to sad stories and read something fun too, ok?
Want to borrow one of mine?
I am a grown-up compared to my sisters Yuki and Tsuki.
I think I have good discretion.
Everyone gets so psyched up during the preparations.
But I cannot believe how carefree our club is.
There is nothing for the Literature Club to get psyched up about.
They do the same thing every year.
It might be different if we did a poetry reading or something.
There might be people who would like it...
Sis Tsuki, do not you have to do anything?
My sister's sick, and I have to take her to the doctor!
So, you are going to walk home with me today.
Well, my class is going to do a maze and a bazaar...
I thought there was someone watching us...
Well, I will have to excuse myself now.
It is often just your imagination at times like this.
You know, when people take the same path home and you get too self conscious.
If it is just our imagination it will be gone before we know it.
Looks like we had the wrong misunderstanding...
How long did the silent battle go on?
It might have been only 4 or 5 minutes.
But the tension.was too much for us!
We have failed in giving our tail the slip.
If we make it to a main street there will be people there.
We should try to find a way out of this mess...
We made a fool of ourselves!
But it looks like it was a misunderstanding after all!
This was nothing but the prelude to the terrifying incident that was about to unfold.
Yukino's an actor as she is, so why does she need to practice?
Dear, you know how it is.
The springtime of her life, huh?
My battle began on that day.
She is convinced that that incident yesterday was a misunderstanding.
You did not see it at all.
Do not you stand behind me!
Kano's been reading too many books.
Well, I will go on ahead.
Cannot let your gloomy mood drag me down or I will bomb first-period English!
Come to think of it, I have seen her around a lot lately.
Who on earth could the shadow be?
There are cases of people getting caught up in a crime without their knowledge...
Wait, dad's lottery ticket they must be after them...
We have not even won yet.
Y-yes... this is the... Miyazawa residence...
Maybe it is someone who likes you, Kano.
What the heck are you thinking?
You are still talking about that?
I told you it is your imagination.
I am going to the bathroom.
Those sisters of mine are no help at all.
You are sure taking your time.
Kano around because she likes her!
At the stage when they are still not comfortable with boys...
Well, I am too busy right now,
between love, the play, and studying.
And I am doing the maze and the bazaar.
I thought you said it is supposed be all helter-skelter and muddled.
Kano, you are always reading those difficult books,
Oh, it is wonderful to be young!
My father realized it is not a guy so he could care less.
Love is something you have to face by yourself...
Wait, why am I taking this seriously?!
Hey, is not that the girl?
Why do not you go talk to her?
Maybe that dark shadow following me around was the girl from 2-D
Then what was that figure this morning...
But first, we have to get out of here fast.
Hey, what is going on anyway?
Nobody will dare marry my little princess, not even a girl!
What are you talking about, Dad?
We are not going to get... married or...
I said, do not take this seriously.
In short, I am at a loss.
Excuse me, What would you do if a girl you did not know told you she liked you?
It is all cool with me.
Sorry, I do not understand that kind of thing.
Being liked by someone is so bewildering.
There are no words to describe it.
Well, this sounds like a good opportunity for an armchair love counselor like you.
But I honestly do not need to experience this kind of thing.
She had this threatening look on her face.
And make sure she does not run away!
If she said all that, what is this for?
Is not it just a formality?
It is a challenge after all.
You can be my chaperone, or just a witness.
So a crisis finally befell even you, the theorist!
What should I do, what should I do?
If she, you know, starts crying all of a sudden, or...
Well, that is not what I mean...
If we cannot be together, I would rather die!
Tsuki... you are laughing too much.
I am just going to take the plunge.
I am just going to say how I feel right now.
Want me to go with you?
I am just going to plunge.
Do not secretly watch or anything.
What a strange turn of events, do not you think, Rika-chan?
When it gets this far even her cool is affected.
Do you like me or something?
Do you like me or something?
Like me... are not you the one who is after me?
You are looking at me all the time!
I looked at you because you were there.
I mean, are not you the one who was always following me?
At school, and on the way home, and you were even looking up at me in front of my house!
I live in the neighborhood, so I cannot help it!
I have to go that way to get home.
Why were you looking at me?
Because you were looking at me!
Because you were looking at me...!
I thought you were staring at me all the time...
That is what I thought too.
I thought, she must have fallen for me.
And then I started blushing myself...
And turning away if I made eye contact...
And thinking that I would have
What, so both of you were jousting the windmill?
Yeah, seems Megumi-chan was troubled too.
Yeah, Megumi-chan the armchair love counselor.
Well, we did not become a couple, but we did become friends.
It was all her evil plot.
Tsuki had Yurika follow me around.
But Kano always looks so unruffled and all-knowing and could not care less no matter what happens,
so it just makes me want to have a little fun with her.
So in the beginning, it was just to scare me,
but after Megumi-chan came into the picture,
they changed plans and got the gentian!
It was more fun that way!
Tsukino... maybe you are... picking on Kano too m...
Will you accept the gentian this time?
Then was the gentian last time for me too?
I just assumed that was to trick Kano...
I would always thought Kano had such a nice sister...
Yurika would have helped her fool me.
Would you please be my sister?
Sis thoughtlessly does not realize that something is wrong with Arima-kun!
Tonami Takefumi finally realizes his feelings!
And people do not realize what is going on!
If you want to know, pls.
